value.label: Drop high-missing columns
value.description: Drop columns

parameters.name: missing_threshold
parameters.label: Missingness threshold (%)
parameters.description: Columns at or above this missing percentage will be removed.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to drop (recommended)
parameters.description: Pre-populated with EDA suggestions covering high-missing, empty, or constant columns.

value.label: Drop high-missing rows
value.description: Remove rows with excessive missing values.

parameters.name: missing_threshold
parameters.label: Missingness threshold (%)
parameters.description: Rows at or above this missing percentage will be removed.

parameters.name: drop_if_any_missing
parameters.label: Drop rows with any missing value
parameters.description: Override the threshold and drop rows that contain any missing value.

value.label: Missing value indicator
value.description: Append binary *_was_missing columns that flag rows with missing data.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to flag
parameters.description: Choose columns to generate missing-value indicator fields (default: columns with missing data).

parameters.name: flag_suffix
parameters.label: Indicator suffix
parameters.description: Suffix appended to the original column name when creating the flag column.

value.label: Cast column types
value.description: Convert selected columns to a target pandas dtype (e.g., float64, Int64, datetime).

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to cast
parameters.description: Select columns to convert to the target dtype.

parameters.name: target_dtype
parameters.label: Target dtype
parameters.description: Enter a pandas dtype such as float64, Int64, string, boolean, or datetime64[ns].

parameters.name: coerce_on_error
parameters.label: Coerce invalid values
parameters.description: Convert unparseable values to missing instead of raising errors.

value.label: Imputation methods
value.description: Configure statistical or model-driven fills (mean/median/mode, KNN, regression, MICE).

parameters.name: strategies
parameters.label: Imputation recipes
parameters.description: Configure multivariate strategies like KNN, regression, or MICE per column group.

value.label: Binning / Discretization
value.description: Convert continuous features into discrete bins using equal-width, equal-frequency (quantile), or custom domain-based strategies. Useful for reducing noise or capturing threshold-based effects. Note: Tree-based models typically don't require binning.

parameters.name: binning_rules
parameters.label: Binning rules
parameters.description: Configure binning strategy per column: equal-width, equal-frequency (quantile), or custom edges.

parameters.name: default_strategy
parameters.label: Default strategy
parameters.description: Default binning strategy for columns without explicit rules.

parameters.name: default_bins
parameters.label: Default number of bins
parameters.description: Default number of bins to create (for equal-width and equal-frequency strategies).

parameters.name: label_format
parameters.label: Label format
parameters.description: How to label bins: 'ordinal' (0,1,2...), 'interval' ([0-10], [10-20]...), or 'left_edge' (0, 10, 20...).

value.label: Label encode categories
value.description: Convert categorical columns into integer codes for model-ready features.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to encode
parameters.description: Choose categorical columns or leave blank to rely on auto-detection.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect categorical columns
parameters.description: Automatically include text columns when their unique values stay under the configured limit.

parameters.name: max_unique_values
parameters.label: Max categories for auto-detect
parameters.description: Upper bound on unique values when auto-detect is enabled (0 disables the cap).

parameters.name: output_suffix
parameters.label: Encoded suffix
parameters.description: Suffix applied to the encoded column when the original is retained.

parameters.name: drop_original
parameters.label: Replace original column
parameters.description: Overwrite the source column instead of creating a suffixed copy.

parameters.name: missing_strategy
parameters.label: Missing value strategy
parameters.description: Keep missing values as <NA> or assign a dedicated integer code.

parameters.name: missing_code
parameters.label: Missing value code
parameters.description: Integer code used when assigning a dedicated value to missing entries.

value.label: Target encode categories
value.description: Replace categorical values with smoothed averages of a numeric target column.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to encode
parameters.description: Select categorical columns or rely on auto-detection when safe.

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target column
parameters.description: Numeric target column used to compute per-category averages (e.g., regression value or 0/1 outcome).

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect categorical columns
parameters.description: Automatically include text columns that stay within the category limit.

parameters.name: max_categories
parameters.label: Max categories
parameters.description: Upper bound on unique values when auto-detect is enabled (0 disables the cap).

parameters.name: output_suffix
parameters.label: Encoded suffix
parameters.description: Suffix added to new encoded columns when originals are retained.

parameters.name: drop_original
parameters.label: Replace original column
parameters.description: Overwrite the source column instead of creating a suffixed copy.

parameters.name: smoothing
parameters.label: Smoothing strength
parameters.description: Higher values pull category means toward the global average to reduce overfitting.

parameters.name: encode_missing
parameters.label: Encode missing values
parameters.description: Assign the global mean to rows where the categorical value is missing.

parameters.name: handle_unknown
parameters.label: Handle unseen categories
parameters.description: Choose whether to assign the global mean or raise an error for categories not observed during fitting.

value.label: Ordinal encode categories
value.description: Map categorical columns to ordered codes with optional unknown fallbacks.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to encode
parameters.description: Select categorical columns or rely on auto-detection when safe.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect categorical columns
parameters.description: Automatically include text columns that stay within the category limit.

parameters.name: max_categories
parameters.label: Max categories
parameters.description: Upper bound on unique values when auto-detect is enabled (0 disables the cap).

parameters.name: output_suffix
parameters.label: Encoded suffix
parameters.description: Suffix added to new encoded columns when originals are retained.

parameters.name: drop_original
parameters.label: Replace original column
parameters.description: Overwrite the source column instead of creating a suffixed copy.

parameters.name: encode_missing
parameters.label: Encode missing values
parameters.description: Assign the fallback code to missing values instead of leaving them null.

parameters.name: handle_unknown
parameters.label: Handle unseen categories
parameters.description: Choose whether to assign a fallback code or raise an error for unknown categories.

parameters.name: unknown_value
parameters.label: Fallback code
parameters.description: Integer code applied to unseen categories or missing values when enabled.

value.label: Dummy encode categories
value.description: Expand categorical columns while dropping a reference level per feature.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to encode
parameters.description: Select categorical columns or rely on auto-detection to capture safe candidates.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect categorical columns
parameters.description: Automatically include text columns that keep dummy width manageable.

parameters.name: max_categories
parameters.label: Max categories
parameters.description: Upper bound on unique values when auto-detect is enabled (0 disables the cap).

parameters.name: drop_first
parameters.label: Drop reference level
parameters.description: Always drop the first dummy column per feature to mitigate multicollinearity.

parameters.name: include_missing
parameters.label: Encode missing values
parameters.description: Include a dedicated dummy column for missing values.

parameters.name: drop_original
parameters.label: Replace original column
parameters.description: Remove the source column after dummy expansion.

parameters.name: prefix_separator
parameters.label: Dummy prefix separator
parameters.description: Separator between the column name and category when naming dummy columns.

value.label: One-hot encode categories
value.description: Expand categorical columns into binary indicator features.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to encode
parameters.description: Choose categorical columns or rely on auto-detection to keep configs light.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect categorical columns
parameters.description: Automatically include text columns when their dummy expansion stays within the max category limit.

parameters.name: max_categories
parameters.label: Max categories
parameters.description: Upper bound on unique values when auto-detect is enabled (0 disables the cap).

parameters.name: drop_first
parameters.label: Drop first dummy
parameters.description: Avoid multicollinearity by dropping the first dummy column per feature.

parameters.name: include_missing
parameters.label: Encode missing values
parameters.description: Include a dedicated dummy column for missing values.

parameters.name: drop_original
parameters.label: Replace original column
parameters.description: Remove the source column after dummy expansion.

parameters.name: prefix_separator
parameters.label: Dummy prefix separator
parameters.description: Separator between the column name and category value when naming dummy columns.

value.label: Scale numeric features
value.description: Standardize or normalize numeric columns with recommended scalers.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to scale
parameters.description: Select numeric columns manually or leave blank to rely on auto-detection.

parameters.name: default_method
parameters.label: Default scaling method
parameters.description: Fallback scaler applied whenever a column override is not configured.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect numeric columns
parameters.description: Automatically include continuous numeric columns that pass quality checks.

value.label: Polynomial features
value.description: Generate polynomial and interaction terms for numeric columns.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Columns to expand
parameters.description: Select numeric columns manually or leave blank to auto-detect.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect numeric columns
parameters.description: Automatically include numeric columns detected at runtime.

parameters.name: degree
parameters.label: Maximum degree
parameters.description: Upper polynomial degree to generate (higher degrees create more features).

parameters.name: include_bias
parameters.label: Add bias column
parameters.description: Include a constant bias column when enabled.

parameters.name: interaction_only
parameters.label: Interaction only
parameters.description: Generate only interaction features without power terms.

parameters.name: include_input_features
parameters.label: Include original features
parameters.description: Retain degree-1 terms alongside the generated features.

parameters.name: output_prefix
parameters.label: Feature prefix
parameters.description: Prefix applied to generated feature columns.

value.label: Feature selection
value.description: Score features and retain the most informative columns using univariate tests or model-based selectors.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.label: Candidate columns
parameters.description: Select columns to score or leave blank to rely on auto-detection.

parameters.name: auto_detect
parameters.label: Auto-detect numeric columns
parameters.description: Automatically include numeric columns detected at runtime.

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target column
parameters.description: Supervised selectors require a target column for scoring (e.g., regression/classification target).

parameters.name: method
parameters.label: Selection method
parameters.description: Choose the feature selection strategy to apply.

parameters.name: score_func
parameters.label: Scoring function
parameters.description: Statistical test used for univariate selectors.

parameters.name: problem_type
parameters.label: Problem type
parameters.description: Guides default scoring function and estimator selection.

parameters.name: k
parameters.label: Top K features
parameters.description: Number of features to keep when using K-based strategies.

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.label: Percentile
parameters.description: Percentile of features to retain when using percentile strategies.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.label: Alpha
parameters.description: Significance threshold for FPR/FDR/FWE modes.

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.label: Threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for variance or model-based selectors (leave blank for defaults).

parameters.name: mode
parameters.label: Generic mode
parameters.description: Mode parameter for GenericUnivariateSelect (k_best, percentile, fpr, fdr, fwe).

parameters.name: estimator
parameters.label: Estimator
parameters.description: Base estimator used for model-based selectors (SelectFromModel / RFE).

parameters.name: step
parameters.label: RFE step
parameters.description: Number (or fraction) of features to remove at each RFE iteration.

parameters.name: min_features
parameters.label: Minimum features
parameters.description: Optional lower bound on features to keep (used by some estimators).

parameters.name: max_features
parameters.label: Maximum features
parameters.description: Optional upper bound on features to keep (used by some estimators).

parameters.name: drop_unselected
parameters.label: Drop unselected columns
parameters.description: Remove columns that fail the selection criteria from the dataset.

value.label: Fix skewed columns
value.description: Surface skewness diagnostics and apply variance-stabilizing transforms.

parameters.name: transformations
parameters.label: Column transformations
parameters.description: Pick recommended transforms per column to reduce skewness.

value.label: Train model
value.description: Validate pipeline readiness and launch background training jobs via Celery.

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target column
parameters.description: Response variable used for downstream modeling.

parameters.name: problem_type
parameters.label: Problem type
parameters.description: Select the modeling task for downstream training.

parameters.name: model_type
parameters.label: Model template
parameters.description: Registered estimator used when enqueuing training jobs.

parameters.name: hyperparameters
parameters.label: Hyperparameters (JSON)
parameters.description: Optional JSON object merged with the model template defaults.

value.label: Binned column distributions
value.description: Visualize category counts for columns generated by binning.

value.label: Skewness distributions
value.description: Visualize distributions for skewed numeric columns.

value.label: Data snapshot
value.description: Inspect a sample of the dataset after upstream transforms.

value.label: Separate features & target
value.description: Designate the supervised target column. All remaining columns are treated as features (X).

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target column
parameters.description: Column treated as the target (y) for downstream modeling.

value.label: Train/Test Split
value.description: Split dataset into training, testing, and optionally validation sets. Supports stratification.

parameters.name: test_size
parameters.label: Test size
parameters.description: Proportion of the dataset to include in the test split.

parameters.name: validation_size
parameters.label: Validation size
parameters.description: Proportion of the dataset to include in the validation split (optional).

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.label: Random state
parameters.description: Seed for reproducible splits. Leave empty for random.

parameters.name: shuffle
parameters.label: Shuffle
parameters.description: Whether to shuffle the data before splitting.

parameters.name: stratify
parameters.label: Stratify
parameters.description: Preserve class distribution in splits using the target column.

parameters.name: target_column
parameters.label: Target column (for stratification)
parameters.description: Column to use for stratified splitting (required if stratify is enabled).

value.label: Transformer audit
value.description: Inspect transformer fit/transform activity across train, test, and validation splits.

value.label: Dataset profile
value.description: Generate a lightweight dataset profile with summary statistics.
